text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_dailyOperatingTimeDesc
text.text: How often maintenance should be performed daily. This feature is currently inactive.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_repaironlyDesc
text.text: Vehicle repairs and maintenance can only be performed in a vehicle workshop.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_workshopOpenDesc
text.text: The vehicle workshop opens at this time.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_workshopCloseDesc
text.text: The vehicle workshop closes at this time.

text.name: ui_RVB_gameplaysetting_lifetimePartsDesc
text.text: The smaller this number, the sooner it will fail.

text.name: ui_RVB_generalsetting_alertMessageDesc
text.text: If your vehicle is damaged, maintained, or repaired, a warning message appears in the center of the screen while you are in the vehicle.

text.name: ui_RVB_generalsetting_difficultyDesc
text.text: Currently under development, but ready for use.

text.name: ui_RVB_generalsetting_basicrepairtriggerDesc
text.text: You can open the Real Vehicle Breakdowns (RVB) menu at the basic vehicle workshop trigger point.

text.name: ui_RVB_generalsetting_debugDisplayDesc
text.text: Displays the operating time of vehicle parts. Recommended for testing.

text.name: RVB_WorkShopClose
text.text: The vehicle workshop is closed; please return at %s.

text.name: RVB_inspectionDialog
text.text: Are you sure you want to inspect this vehicle for %s?

text.name: RVB_inspectionTimeDialog
text.text: The vehicle inspection will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_inspectionDayDialog
text.text: The vehicle inspection will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_repairTimeDialog
text.text: The vehicle repair will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_repairDayDialog
text.text: The vehicle repair will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceDialog
text.text: Are you sure you want to service the vehicle for %s?

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceTimeDialog
text.text: The vehicle service will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_periodicserviceDayDialog
text.text: The vehicle service will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_batteryChDialog
text.text: Are you sure you want to charge the vehicle's battery for %s?

text.name: RVB_batteryChTimeDialog
text.text: The vehicle's battery charging will be completed at %s.

text.name: RVB_batteryChDayDialog
text.text: The vehicle's battery charging will be completed tomorrow at %s.

text.name: RVB_occupied
text.text: The vehicle is already in use!

text.name: RVB_inspectionDialogEnd_other
text.text: %s vehicle inspected and repaired. Your mechanic was very busy, so a junior mechanic repaired your vehicle. However, this junior mechanic cannot list what was fixed on your vehicle.

text.name: RVB_fault_
text.text: Don't drive too fast; the engine is still cold.

text.name: RVB_fault_hud
text.text: %s is being driven too fast; the engine is still cold.

text.name: RVB_fault_BHlights_hud
text.text: %s vehicle's battery charge level is too low.

text.name: RVB_main_repair_fault
text.text: The mechanic cannot repair this vehicle; visit the "RVB" Service

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_INSPECTION
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, inspection in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_REPAIR
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, repair in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_SERVICE
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, servicing in progress.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_SUSPENSION
text.text: Vehicle keys with mechanic who is on break.

text.name: VehicleBreakdown_DEAD_ENGINE_BATTERY_CHARGING
text.text: Vehicle cannot be started, battery charging in progress.

text.name: Automatic_Repair_conflict_notice
text.text: Certain modifications automatically repair the vehicle, but since you are using the "Real Vehicle Failures (RVB)" modification, it may conflict with other mods. The following mod(s) in the list require overriding automatic repair, which RVB has already done in the background.

text.name: Automatic_Repair_conflict_signature
text.text:
Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards, MathiasHun

text.name: RVB_aimessage_batterydischarged
text.text: %s AI helper unexpectedly stopped work; the vehicle's battery has discharged!
